title: Public /create page with portfolio showcase, CTAs, ad placeholders, SEO, and discovery

requirements.summary: Create a new public CreatePage at /create showcasing work, services, CTAs to contact, and ad placeholder blocks (English text only, no ad network integrations).
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to `/create` renders a new Create page under the existing PublicLayout (navbar + footer).

The Create page includes: (1) a hero/intro section, (2) a “Featured Work” section that reuses existing projects data/cards or a subset of them, (3) a “Services”/“What I can do for you” section, (4) at least one primary CTA button linking to `/contact`, and (5) an “Advertisements” section containing responsive placeholder ad blocks (e.g., banner and square units) labeled as ad space.
No third-party ad scripts, SDKs, iframes, or network integrations are added; ad blocks are purely UI placeholders that could later be swapped with real ad code by a developer.
Page is responsive and matches the existing site visual theme and dark mode styling.

file_operations.description: Implement CreatePage UI under the public site theme using Tailwind: hero/intro section (English text), “Featured Work” section that reuses existing portfolio projects query (useGetProjects) and existing ProjectCard for a curated subset, a “Services / What I can do for you” section, a prominent primary CTA linking to `/contact`, and an “Advertisements” section with responsive, clearly labeled ad placeholder blocks (banner + square) as pure UI (no third-party scripts, SDKs, iframes, or ad network code).
Wire CreatePage into the TanStack Router public route tree by importing the page component and adding a new public route at path `/create` under PublicLayout.

requirements.summary: Expose the Create page in the public navigation for desktop and mobile with correct active-route styling.
acceptanceCriteria: PublicNavbar shows a new nav link labeled “Create” that routes to `/create` on both desktop and mobile menus.
The active-route styling works for `/create` the same way it does for other public links.

file_operations.description: Add `{ path: '/create', label: 'Create' }` to the existing navLinks list so the link appears in both desktop and mobile menus, and ensure active-route styling applies when currentPath is `/create`.

requirements.summary: Add route-aware SEO metadata for /create (title, description, OG image) using the existing SEO mapping system.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/seo/routeSeo.ts` includes a `/create` entry with an English title and description appropriate for a client-attraction/portfolio showcase page.
Visiting `/create` updates the document title and meta tags via the existing SeoHeadManager behavior (no changes required to SeoHeadManager beyond adding the route mapping).

file_operations.description: Add a new `/create` entry to routeSeoMap with an English title/description aligned to a services + portfolio showcase page, and set ogImage to an existing generated asset already used by the site (e.g., the hero background image) to remain consistent with the current SEO system.

requirements.summary: Add /create to the static public sitemap for search discovery.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` includes a `<url>` entry for `https://your-domain.com/create` with reasonable changefreq/priority values aligned with the existing sitemap style.
No admin routes are added to the sitemap.

file_operations.description: Insert a new `<url>` entry for `https://your-domain.com/create` with changefreq/priority values consistent with the existing public routes, ensuring only the public `/create` route is added (no admin URLs).
